about_the_game:
If your rivals made you see red, after the race you might want to get some relaxation surrounded by more soothing shades of pink! So here is the perfect pack for you: 8 elements in the tones of pink to customize your Basement with fancy decorations and that fashion touch that will charm everyone. Even your toughest opponents! As they will be distracted by your Interior Designer skills, you can overtake them without mercy! Talk about Fashion Victims! So the prettier your Basement is, the better it is for your chances of winning!

Also, this exclusive pack features 3 exclusive elements for your Unleashed Profile, with a dedicated icon, tag and background! Show off your style, not just in the race!

This DLC includes:

For the Basement:
  • 2 walls
  • 2 floors
  • 1 door
  • 1 decoration
  • 1 couch
  • 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile:
  • 1 icon
  • 1 tag
  • 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: If your rivals made you see red, after the race get some relaxation surrounded by soothing shades of pink and fancy decorations. A fashion touch for your Basement and your Unleashed Profile to show off your style, not just in the race!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
